name: ingenidev, UAE – AED Currency Symbol Changer
author: ingenidev

sections.description:
By default, WooCommerce uses the currency symbol for the United Arab Emirates Dirham (AED) as “د.إ”. This plugin changes it to “AED “.

Privacy notices

This plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users
  • write any user personal data to the database
  • send any data to external servers
  • make use of cookies

Our plugins

The following plugins are recommended by ingenidev :

  • Code Widget for Elementor This plugin for Elementor adds a widget for a code snipet to your pages, the snipet includes code formatting and a built in copy to clipboard function.
  • Cash on Delivery Shield a plugin that allows you to disable Cash on Delivery payment method for orders made by users who are not logged in.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with AED Currency Symbol Changer? Use these support channels appropriately.

  1. Website
  2. Plugin Page
  3. Support
